title: Cannot patch to 7.11, play bar just stays grey
body: I have not been able to patch to 7.11 after multiple restarts of client as well as initiating a full repair. I can't spectate games, all I have is a greyed out Play button that says 'We aren't able to create a lobby right now. Please exit the client and re-open it to try again.' Help?

replies.body: It sounds like either the patch didn't download correctly or your network might be having a hard time getting connected to our servers. Let's make sure the patch worked correctly first since that's a much quicker fix. Grab this [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run a **Force Repatch** and let me know if you can get back on the Rift.
I tried that for mine and when I opened the client it said "we have restored this installation to an older version of league of legends" but it's said that every time that I've tried to open it

In that case, your patcher is having problems downloading the patch because the patch before that didn't install quite successfully. At this point, I'd suggest grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool ) and running a **Force Repatch**.
I already tried the force patch and it didn't work DX
yeah I've tried that a bunch of times and nothing

I also tried uninstalling and reinstalling and it still didn't work
Same problem.  Never had this issue before.  Please help us.
